captions.text: - Oh my God, I'm so sorry I'm late.

I was in a car accident,
but everyone's fine.

- Oh, everyone's fine?
- Everyone's totally fine.

- [Voiceover] Yeah!
Should we go get coffee?

- [Voiceover] Were the
people you hit driving?
- Oh no, I got a parking ticket!

and I aren't together yet,
'cause we're not ready.

- Right, and when you are
ready, you'll get together.
- And then you'll probably get married.

So do you wanna go to the
Taylor Swift Museum later?
- I don't think he saw you at all.
- Probably just having a hard day.
Ugh, I can't find my wallet.
Do you think it's cold out?
Go talk to him, he totally likes you.

- Yeah, do it, do it.
- I'm gonna do it.
What's the worst that could happen?
- Hey Allison, I'm going to Walgreens.
How many lottery tickets you want?
Last time we won four dollars.
- Oh! Agh, I wasn't hungry anyway.

- I asked him to dinner but
he said he already had plans.

That gives you time tonight
to work on your novel.
I feel like once I start,
it's gonna be super-easy to finish.
I can't wait to read it.

- New York Times
best-seller, here we come!

- ♫ No chains to unlock
- ♫ No chains to unlock

- ♫ So free to do
- ♫ So free to do

- ♫ What he wants
- ♫ What he wants

- ♫ He's into what he's got
- ♫ He's into what he's got

- ♫ He loves me
- ♫ He loves me
- Oh, we'll get it next time.
